geninfo.para: International® DT 466, DT 570, and HT 570 Diesel Engines with serial numbers between 2000001 and 2072379 were produced with small geometry valve train components.

note.para: A small number of 2004 MY International® DT 466 diesel engines were built with an ESN below 2000001. These can be identified by checking the Engine Family designation on the emission label.

geninfo.para: The small geometry support and rocker shaft assembly will be discontinued from service.

A Small Geometry Adjuster Kit (1876798C91) provides a replacement large geometry rocker shaft assembly with small geometry adjuster screws that can be used with existing small geometry push rods and tappets.

figure.caption: Figure 1. Adjuster screws (small geometry on the left)

note.para: The large geometry adjuster screws have a hex head, larger diameter ball, and are longer. The small geometry adjuster screws have a slotted head, smaller diameter ball, and are shorter.
